summary: The inmate Proietti, nicknamed "Er Soffia", getting out of prison. There is the Roman brigadier Vasco Sacchetti, an agent of the narcotics and his old friend who, to celebrate his freedom, invites him to eat fish at Fiumicino.
cast: Enrico Montesano|Renato Pozzetto|Anna Benny|Antonio Ballerio|Victor Cavallo|Francesco De Rosa|Angelo Bernabucci|Mirella Falco|Roberto Della Casa|Giorgio Trestini|Tony Sperandeo|Norman Sanny|Carla Monti|Luigi Petrucci|Pietro Sarubbi|Pino Ammendola|Ennio Antonelli|Nello Pazzafini|Giuseppe Affer|Daniele Guatelli|Aldo Izzo|Fabrizio Marchetti|Terry Schiavo|Monica Spreafico|Gualberto Parmeggiani|Tony Raccosta
title: Piedipiatti
